desc.de: Führt eine lineare Bewegung der Druckerachsen durch. G1 ist der Standardbefehl, G0 ein Alias in Marlin.
desc.en: Add a straight line movement to the planner

examples.code:
G0 X12         ; Move to 12mm on the X axis
G0 F1500       ; Set the feedrate to 1500 mm/min
G1 X90.6 Y13.8 ; Move to 90.6mm on the X axis and 13.8mm on the Y axis

note.en: The most basic move sets a feedrate and moves the tool to the given position.

examples.code:
G1 F1500           ; Set the feedrate to 1500 mm/min
G92 E0
G1 X50 Y25.3 E22.4 ; Move while extruding

note.en: There are some caveats related with feedrates. Consider the following: In the above example the feedrate is set to 1500 mm/min, then the tool is moved 50mm on the X axis and 25.3mm on the Y axis while extruding 22.4mm of filament between the two points.

However, in the above example, we set a feedrate of 1500 mm/min on line 1 then do the move described above, accelerating to a feedrate of 3000 mm/min (if possible). The extrusion will accelerate along with the X and Y movement, so everything stays synchronized.

desc.de: Listet alle Dateien auf der SD-Karte im Terminal auf.
desc.en: List the contents of the SD Card.

examples.code:
> M20
Begin file list
MYFILE.GCO 14129
SUBDIR~1/MORETH\~1.GCO 68447
End file list
ok

note.en: List the contents of the SD card The firmware will send no other output between "Begin file list" and "End file list."

examples.code:
> M20 L
Begin file list
MYFILE.GCO 14129 MyFile.gcode
SUBDIR~1/MORETH\~1.GCO 68447 Sub Directory/MoretHall.gcode
End file list
ok

note.en: List files with long filename (for display) This format produces a prettier File Manager in OctoPrint, but the long name is not used in selecting the file to print, nor are folder long names included.

examples.code:
> M20 T
Begin file list
MYFILE.GCO 14129 0x5515758F
SUBDIR~1/MORETH\~1.GCO 68447 0x55195745
End file list
ok

> M20 L T
Begin file list
MYFILE.GCO 14129 0x5515758F MyFile.gcode
SUBDIR~1/MORETH\~1.GCO 68447 0x55195745 Sub Directory/MoretHall.gcode
End file list
ok
